news.title: Bitcoin Firms Team Up to Launch ‘Clean Energy' Mining Venture
news.text: DMG Solutions and Argo Blockchain are teaming up to launch a Bitcoin mining pool to run on hydroelectric resources.

news.title: Market Roundup: Friday Bounce Sees Bitcoin Recover To $53,500 While Altcoins Rally
news.text: Following a tumultuous week for the crypto market, things finally appeared to be turning around on Friday. Thursday's massive sell-off was greeted with green across the board on Friday.

news.title: KiwiSaver fund invests in Bitcoin as institutional interest swells
news.text: KiwiSaver Growth Strategy, a retirement fund run by New Zealand Wealth Funds Management, has invested in Bitcoin (BTC). A report unveiled this news on March 26, noting that the £254 million fund had allocated 5% of its asset to BTC. Allegedly, the company made this investment because of BTC's similarity to gold as a hedge […] The post KiwiSaver fund invests in Bitcoin as institutional interest swells appeared first on Invezz.

news.title: BTC/USD Peaks Above 54225 on Rebound: Sally Ho's Technical Analysis 27 March 2021 BTC
news.text: Bitcoin (BTC/USD) gained ground early in the Asian session as the pair appreciated to the 54096.27 level after trading as low as the 52200 level during the European session, with the interday high representing a test of the 76.4% retracement of the appreciating range from 53025 to 57402.14.  A pullback during the North American session saw buying pressure keep BTC/USD bid above the 52502.92 area, representing the 61.8% retracement of the depreciating range from 58367 to 43016.

news.title: Price analysis 3/26: BTC, ETH, BNB, ADA, DOT, XRP, UNI, THETA, LTC, LINK
news.text: Bitcoin price bounced off the 50-day moving average but the real test is near $57,500 where the bears are likely to push back.

news.title: Is General Motors Planning to Accept Bitcoin Payments?
news.text: Automotive giant General Motors is monitoring Bitcoin's potential, according to statements from its CEO, but it is not yet clear whether the firm actually plans to accept the cryptocurrency. GM Is Monitoring Bitcoin General Motors CEO Mary Barra recently stated that the company “[doesn't] have any plans to invest in Bitcoin, so full stop there.

news.title: Microsoft Rolls Out Bitcoin-Powered Identity Platform
news.text: Microsoft is launching a platform that can authenticate identities using the Bitcoin blockchain. The tech giant says v1 of the ION decentralized identifier (DID) network is finally complete and now live. ION is a decentralized layer 2 technology for DID, which can verify the identity of a person, or any subject, without relying on third […] The post Microsoft Rolls Out Bitcoin-Powered Identity Platform appeared first on The Daily Hodl.

news.title: Bitcoin at 'Inflection Point' as Fiat Debasement Rises: Soros Fund Management CIO
news.text: Investment banker Dawn Fitzpatrick said the private investment fund is putting money into cryptocurrency infrastructure.

news.title: Bitcoin Rejected At $60K While Global Markets Start To Splutter: The Weekly Crypto Recap
news.text: Bears took control this week, sending Bitcoin's price from around $60K down to $50K. Traditional markets also struggled as NASDAQ is deep in the red over the past seven days.

news.title: Ark Investment's Cathie Wood Cautions Investors On Buying Tesla With Bitcoin (BTC)
news.text: Earlier this week, Tesla CEO Elon Musk announced that the company has started accepting Bitcoin payments against the purchase of any Tesla model. While this news certainly sparked excitement among Bitcoin investors and Tesla fans, there's a moment of caution to observe.
